name: 魏暘
objective: An introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering is offered in this course. Topics include the first and second laws of thermodynamics, open and closed systems, with additional emphasis on thermodynamic properties in phase equilibrium of solutions, general correlations with real fluids, and multi-component systems.
schedule:
1: Introduction to Thermodynamics 
2: Phase Diagrams of Pure Fluids
3: Energy and the First Law
4: Entropy and the Second Law
5: Mid-term exam
6: Properties of Solution 
7: Phase Equilibrium
8: Flow Process
9: Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. Class performance/absence/homework 50%
2. Two quizzes 10%
2. Midterm exam 20%
3. Final exam 20%
materials:
A. Class Handout
B. Referenced Book
1. Fundamentals of Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics; ISBN-13: 978-0132693066; ISBN-10: 0132693062; 作者: Themis Matsoukas
2. Introduction to Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics 8/e;  ISBN: 9781259921896 作者：J. M. Smith, H. C. Van Ness, M. M. Abbott, M. T. Swihart; 
3. Chemical, Biochemical, and Engineering Thermodynamics; ISBN 978-1-119-32128-6; 作者: Stanley I. Sandler
